HGE Particle Systems Editor

HGE Particle Systems Editor allows you to create and edit advanced 2D particle systems in a convinient and efficient way. See the following sections for more detailed information:

Using editor interface
Brief explanation of Particle Systems Editor interface and functions.
Editor initialization files
Description of Particle Systems Editor initialization file parameters
and the particle sprites file.
Using presets in your game
Explanation and code examples of how to load and run Particle
Systems Editor presets in your game.
Particle systems hints
Some tips and ideas what particle systems may be used for in your
game and how to make them looking even more attractive.

See also

hgeParticleSystem, hgeParticleManager
